divs: Sighting DetailsIn 1968 Stockton Ca. I witnessed a huge Silver UFO , the light from the craft caught my attention while walking one summer evening about 9p very dark night no moon, but this huge UFO hovering above me about 300ft. When I Notice the UFO It was amazing , the craft was covered in a luminescent glowing cloud which was rapidly covering the entire UfO, when the luminescent smoke reached the very top of the craft if completely disappeared from sight. It simply vanished Right in front of my eyes.
Summary: Watched Silver UFO vanish before my eyes.
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Stockton
There were no other sightings in Stockton on or around August 11th 1968
